name: Cynics
description: Cynics, a telegram userbot with MongoDB database

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running [python3 string_session.py] in Termux or local system.

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: your repo fork url, if you don't know about this leave as it.

DATABASE_URL.description: This is for the database account, you can obtain it from mongodb.com.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your heroku api key if using heroku.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your heroku app name if using heroku.

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: A private group id to store your logs.
